YO BOT: If you're interested in a website, enter "WEBSITE". If you're an existing client and need website help, enter "HELP". If you're just visiting, enter "MORE".
WEBSITE: Tell me a little bit about your project by entering "MY PROJECT IS" followed by a brief description about your website.
MY PROJECT IS: Neat! Now tell me what your timeline is by entering "MY TIMELINE IS" followed by when you'd want your project by.
MY TIMELINE IS: I see. Do you have a budget? If so enter "BUDGET" followed by your budget. If you don't have a budget, enter "NO BUDGET".
NO BUDGET: Cool. I'll make sure to put you at the top of Miguel's list. Give me your email by entering "EMAIL" followed by your email address.
EMAIL: Perfect. Miguel will reach out to you very soon. Nice talking to ya! If you'd like to talk some more, enter "MORE".
HELP: I'm currently analyzing all of Miguel's records so I can intelligently assist you. Please come back soon.
MORE: Want to learn more about Miguel? Enter "ABOUT MIGUEL". You can also learn more about his website work by entering "WORK".
ABOUT MIGUEL: Miguel makes things for the web and studies Human Computer Interaction. He's passionate about simplistic design and helping make the world a better place. Check out some of his work by entering "WORK".
WORK: Check out Miguel's work by going to this link: miguelmolina.co/work. If you need a website, enter "WEBSITE".
